name: monglock
description: Library that manages MongoDB locks of arbitrary documents on arbitrary collections

scripts.test: cp -r ./lib ./test/lib && (cd ./test; docker-compose build; docker-compose up -d mongodb; docker-compose up app; docker-compose stop mongodb; docker-compose rm -fv mongodb;) && rm -r ./test/lib

author: Eric Vallee (eric_vallee@webificservices.com)
